title: Understanding Data Cleaning
description: Data cleaning is the first and most crucial step in any data analysis project. In this post, we explore the tools and techniques for ensuring your data is reliable and accurate.
author: Asad Raza Virk

title: Kisa’s Journey to Becoming a Google Certified Data Analyst
description: Kisa’s personal journey from curiosity to certification—overcoming challenges, embracing learning, and finding confidence as a Google Certified Data Analyst.
author: Kisa Fatima

title: The Story of Data and the Mighty Floods in Punjab
description: A powerful story about how data is helping communities in Punjab, Pakistan, predict, prepare for, and respond to devastating floods.
author: Asad Raza Virk

title: Why a Simple Feedback Form is a Powerful Tool
description: My first semester project taught me the importance of data collection and form design. This blog post explains how a simple feedback form can turn raw opinions into actionable insights.
author: Kisa Fatima

title: Diving Deep into C++: Understanding Data Types and Input
description: This post explains the fundamental building blocks of C++: data types and how to handle user input. Understanding these concepts is essential for writing effective and efficient C++ programs.
author: Kisa Fatima

title: The Real Work: From Digital Noise to Real World Wins
description: You see it everywhere. The internet is a firehose of information—data, opinions, arguments, and hot takes. It's easy to get lost in the digital chaos. But what if you could turn that chaos into a competitive advantage?
author: Asad Raza Virk
